channel.title: Another Doom movie? This cannot be.
channel.description:
[url]https://www.tomshardware.com/news/DOOM-Universal-Studios-Uwe-Boll-The-Rock-PC-Gaming,12365.html[/url]
This might be old news for some of you, but I wanted to point this out to any Doom fans on the forums that might be lurking around, if there are any, who haven't heard of it. There hasn't been much coverage on this lately and it might just be rumor, but I fear another abomination will be in theaters soon. Any one have any rumors or facts about this? Is there really gonna be another one? If so, will it be as horrendous as the first or do you think it will good?

item.source: Another Doom movie? This cannot be.

item.title: Another Doom movie? This cannot be.
item.dc:creator: Zuul
item.description:
Medkit:

The FPS scene (even with some ridiculous zombie scientists) saved the movie from compelete failure. I don’t mind if they make another movie, just make sure it’ll be better than the last one.
There are only a few video game based movies which turned out to be good, (thx to Uwe Boll) most are horrible.

I’m more interested in Doom 4 btw, and just to make it clear I’m 25, and I still play with the original Doom games.

well I’m 37 and I’ve yet to play Doom 4 because my twin 7600GT rig wouldn’t run it at highest setting. And to be honest…the intro didn’t flip my dick. I know that Doom is the shit, at school, it was the shit…that thing just spread like a virus…I got to Doom II then I lost interrest…I thought Quake, Quake II were much more interresting. Much more playable…now, Where is that remake of Redneck Rampage I’m acheing for! Better yet make a movie about the bros fighting thru alien territory, crazy sheriffes and pissed off pigs

Read full topic

item.title: Another Doom movie? This cannot be.
item.dc:creator: Corruptz0rz
item.description:
Rampage wasn’t a block buster but i wouldn’t mind owning it on DVD it was a decent movie. The ending could have been better but i’m not complaining. It was an eye opening movie with lots of gore, good special effects and decent acting. My heart was racing pretty much through the whole film!

…but bloodrayne sucked balls lololol although i was never that much of a bloodrayne fan.

Read full topic
item.source: Another Doom movie? This cannot be.

item.title: Another Doom movie? This cannot be.
item.dc:creator: Frankminimia
item.description:
(rot)(fodder:

I’ve seen Alone in the Dark, half of Blood Rayne and the trailer to Far Cry.

Uwe Boll has all the movie making skills of a monkey testicle. I hadn’t even heard of alone in the dark the game, and have never played bloodrayne. Watching them purely as movies, they are balls, end of story.

P.S. I’d never even heard of Boll prior to watching Alone in the Dark, either. Afterwards of course, that name went onto a do-never-watch list in the back of my head. Ten or so minutes into BloodRayne I found Boll out, rightly guessing that there was only one man capable of actually getting that much bad onto purchasable DVDs.

This happened to me with For the King lol, i saw it on TV and was watching i could just tell that this is uwe boll, looked it up and it was.

Read full topic
item.source: Another Doom movie? This cannot be.

item.title: Another Doom movie? This cannot be.
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

No you don’t.
You’re just another gamer piece of shit that heard “Uwe Boll stinks” and decided to roll with it, despite never sitting down to watch any of his work without that predisposition drilled into your skull.

If you’ve seen Rampage, you’d know he’s probably the best person available to do a take on Doom. God knows Ridley Scott wouldn’t do it.

I’ve seen Alone in the Dark, half of Blood Rayne and the trailer to Far Cry.

Uwe Boll has all the movie making skills of a monkey testicle. I hadn’t even heard of alone in the dark the game, and have never played bloodrayne. Watching them purely as movies, they are balls, end of story.

P.S. I’d never even heard of Boll prior to watching Alone in the Dark, either. Afterwards of course, that name went onto a do-never-watch list in the back of my head. Ten or so minutes into BloodRayne I found Boll out, rightly guessing that there was only one man capable of actually getting that much bad onto purchasable DVDs.

Read full topic

If you’ve seen Rampage, you’d know he’s probably the best person available to do a take on Doom. God knows Ridley Scott wouldn’t do it.

A little presumptuous dont you think? Ive seen his shit movies. Bloodrayne, In the name of the King, Alone in the Dark too name a few. I havent seen Rampage and ill check it out.

Im actually not sure if he has anything to do with Doom i wrote that shit before bed, must have read it some where.
